verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: On Twitter] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday morning] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: queried] [ARG1: if he should " take away credentials " from the media in light of what he called " Fake News " and negative coverage of his administration] .
